instructions.da: Drej skarpt til venstre videre ad Cool highway
instructions.de: Scharf links weiterfahren auf Cool highway
instructions.en: Make a sharp left to stay on Cool highway
instructions.eo: Turniĝu ege maldekstren al Cool highway
instructions.es: Gira a la izquierda en Cool highway
instructions.es-ES: Gire a la izquierda en Cool highway
instructions.fi: Jatka jyrkästi vasempaan pysyäksesi tiellä Cool highway
instructions.fr: Braquer à gauche pour rester sur Cool highway
instructions.he: פנה בחדות שמאלה כדי להישאר על Cool highway
instructions.id: Make a sharp left to stay on Cool highway
instructions.it: Fai una stretta curva a sinistra per stare su Cool highway
instructions.ko: 급좌회전 하신 후 Cool highway로 가세요.
instructions.nl: Sla scherp links af om op Cool highway te blijven
instructions.pl: Skręć w lewo w ostry zakręt, aby pozostać na Cool highway
instructions.pt-BR: Faça uma curva fechada a esquerda para manter-se na Cool highway
instructions.pt-PT: Vire acentuadamente à esquerda para se manter em Cool highway
instructions.ro: Virați puternic la stânga pe Cool highway
instructions.ru: Резко поверните налево на Cool highway
instructions.sv: Sväng vänster och fortsätt på Cool highway
instructions.tr: Cool highway üzerinde kalmak için sola keskin dönüş yap
instructions.uk: Поверніть різко ліворуч щоб залишитись на Cool highway
instructions.vi: Quẹo gắt bên trái để chạy tiếp trên Cool highway
instructions.zh-Hans: 前方左急转弯，继续在Cool highway上行驶
